header.title: Main navigation header
header.showHeaderHint: Double tap to show the header bar

offline.title: You are offline
offline.message: Some features may be unavailable until connectivity is restored.

lowQuality.title: Network is unstable
lowQuality.message: You may experience delays or limited functionality.

maintenance.title: Scheduled maintenance
maintenance.message: Some services may be temporarily unavailable.

loadingOverlay.title: Working...
loadingOverlay.message: Please wait while we finish the request.

general.title: General settings
general.description: Personalize language, appearance, and layout preferences.

appearance.title: Appearance & language
appearance.description: Choose how the app looks and which language it uses.

language.title: Language
language.description: Select the language for menus, labels, and messages.

theme.title: Theme
theme.description: Switch between system, light, and dark modes.

layout.title: Layout
layout.description: Control layout preferences for this device.

footer.title: Footer visibility
footer.description: Show or hide the footer in desktop layouts.

footerVisible.label: Show footer
footerVisible.hint: Show or hide the footer at the bottom of the layout (desktop only)

list.title: OAuth Accounts
list.emptyMessage: No OAuth accounts have been linked yet.
list.loadError: Unable to load OAuth accounts. Check your connection and try again.

emptyState.title: No items
emptyState.message: There are no items to display

landing.title: Start your HMS workspace
landing.description: Choose your facility type to personalize onboarding.

facility.title: Select your facility type
facility.hint: Pick one option to seed your setup. You can change this later.

landing.selectionHelper: You can update this during onboarding.

cta.primaryHint: Begin onboarding with your selected facility type

items.provision: We create your workspace with starter modules
items.samples: Sample data is added so you can explore immediately
items.checklist: You get a facility-specific checklist to activate your workflow

startHere.title: Start here
startHere.subtitle: Complete the essentials to unlock full value
startHere.complete: All set. You are ready for advanced modules.

trialLimit.title: You are close to your trial limit
trialLimit.meta: Upgrade to keep creating new records

readyForIpd.title: You are ready to enable IPD module

pharmacy.title: Enable Pharmacy
pharmacy.benefit: Track dispensing, stock, and point-of-sale in one flow.

lab.title: Enable Lab
lab.benefit: Manage samples, results, and turnaround time.

inventory.title: Enable Inventory
inventory.benefit: Stay ahead of expiry and stock-outs.

hr.title: Enable HR
hr.benefit: Manage shifts, roles, and staffing coverage.

usage.title: Usage and plan
usage.subtitle: Visibility without pressure
usage.limitNote: Nothing is blocked. Only new actions pause at the limit.

states.errorMessage: We could not refresh the dashboard summary.
states.emptyMessage: Summary data will appear once activity starts.
states.retryHint: Attempts to refresh the dashboard data

login.title: Login
login.description: Click the button below to sign in and view the main application layouts
login.buttonHint: Sign in to access the application

email.label: Email or phone number
email.hint: Enter your email or phone number with country code (no +)

tenant.label: Tenant ID
tenant.hint: Enter the tenant ID provided by your organization

facility.label: Facility ID (optional)
facility.hint: Enter the facility ID if available

register.title: Create account
register.description: Register a new account to access HMS

organization.title: Organization setup
organization.description: Enter the tenant and facility information to continue

details.title: Create account
details.description: Provide the new user's details to complete registration

email.label: Email address
email.hint: Enter the email you want to use

password.label: Password
password.hint: Use at least 8 characters with mixed case and symbols

tenant.label: Tenant ID
tenant.hint: Enter the tenant ID provided by your organization

facility.label: Facility ID (optional)
facility.hint: Provide a facility ID if available

phone.label: Phone number (optional)
phone.hint: Provide a phone number with country code (no +)

actions.login: Already have an account? Sign in

forgotPassword.title: Forgot password
forgotPassword.description: Request a password reset link for your account
forgotPassword.buttonHint: Send a password reset link to your email

success.message: If your account exists, a reset link has been sent.

email.label: Email address
email.hint: Enter the email for your account

tenant.label: Tenant ID
tenant.hint: Enter the tenant ID provided by your organization

actions.loginHint: Go back to the login screen

resetPassword.title: Reset password
resetPassword.description: Create a new password using your reset token

success.message: Your password has been reset. You can sign in now.

token.label: Reset token
token.hint: Enter the token from your reset email

password.label: New password
password.hint: Use at least 8 characters with mixed case and symbols

actions.loginHint: Go back to the login screen

verifyEmail.title: Verify email
verifyEmail.description: Confirm your email address with the verification token

success.message: Your email has been verified successfully.

token.label: Verification token
token.hint: Enter the token sent to your email

email.label: Email address (optional)
email.hint: Provide your email address if requested

actions.loginHint: Go back to the login screen

verifyPhone.title: Verify phone
verifyPhone.description: Confirm your phone number with the verification token

success.message: Your phone number has been verified successfully.

token.label: Verification token
token.hint: Enter the token sent to your phone

phone.label: Phone number
phone.hint: Provide the phone number with country code (no +)
